meanings.sent1: The cat's fur was felty to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The felty blanket kept me warm on a chilly night.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sat on a felty cushion and got up with fuzz all over me!
meanings.sent4: The fog had a felty appearance, enveloping everything in a soft haze.
meanings.sent5: The felty fabric absorbed sound, creating a quiet atmosphere in the room.

meanings.definition: Having a texture similar to felt.
meanings.sent1: The felty paper was perfect for crafting.
meanings.sent2: Her gloves were felty and kept her hands cozy.
meanings.sent3: The felty sponge soaked up the spilled juice in no time.
meanings.sent4: The moss had a felty feel under my feet as I walked through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The felty texture of the carpet made it comfortable to walk on barefoot.

meanings.sent1: The felty hat kept his head warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: She wore a felty coat to stay snug in the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The felty gloves were so fuzzy, they tickled my hands.
meanings.sent4: The artist created a felty sculpture that looked incredibly lifelike.
meanings.sent5: The felty texture of the painting added depth and dimension to the artwork.
